If You have the right to be a Mentor, You can find a character suitable to become a Disciple, and enter the name by pressing the [+] button in Familiar/Mentoring. If the character agrees, it will become Your Disciple.
You can become a Disciple, if not yet reached 84 level and did not regenerate.
If You are a Student or Mentor, but unhappy with Your partner may end the relationship. For this purpose press the [ - ] button, selecting the name of a character in a Familiar/Mentoring.
